price: She said, “I seek refuge in the Most Compassionate from you; [do not approach me] if you fear Allah.”
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا
